gameBoard.Board

    gameBoard  

    • Uses of Board in gameBoard

      Methods in gameBoard with parameters of type Board 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Board.getMove(Board b, java.lang.String input, char pID)
      evaluates the origin/destination input string given by user.
      static boolean Board.isCheckmate(Board b)
      evaluates if chess board is in checkmate position prompting for the game to end
      void Board.printBoard(Board b)
      prints the chess board 2d array compares each celltype to get the type of gamePiece and returns it accordingly on the chess board
      void Board.setBoard(Board b)
      sets up the objects on the 9x9 matrix chess board void return nothing as the setting of the board is all done internally returns promptly when match occurs
      void Board.updateBoard(Board b, java.lang.String curr, java.lang.String next, java.lang.String pieceType, char pID)
      updates the board based on the input given by the user the method first clears the origin cell and then updates the destination cell for the correct player
